content.question: Pick one of the following regions and analyze the continuities and changes in the region’s connections to the world trading systems from 1450 to 2000. Be sure to explain how alterations in the framework of international trade interacted with regional factors to produce continuities and changes throughout the period. China Latin America Sub-Saharan Africa Middle East

frqParts.text: Pick one of the following regions and analyze the continuities and changes in the region’s connections to the world trading systems from 1450 to 2000. Be sure to explain how alterations in the framework of international trade interacted with regional factors to produce continuities and changes throughout the period. skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
